law.catch_line: Rules And Regulations; Consistency With Federal Fair Credit Billing Act
law.text: The commissioner may prescribe from time to time rules and regulations consistent with the provisions of the Federal Fair Credit Billing Act 15 USC 1666 to 1666j, inclusive, and the regulations promulgated thereunder, and a creditor upon whom such rules and regulations impose duties or obligations, shall make or give to a customer the disclosures, information and notices required of him by such rules and regulations, and such disclosures, information and notices shall constitute compliance with the provisions of this chapter.
